name: プロデューサー
text:
咲耶、合格おめでとう！
最高のパフォーマンスだったぞ！
trans: Sakuya, congrats on passing! That performance was the absolute best!

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ。ありがとう
私も、楽しくオーディションに挑むことができたよ
trans: Hehe. Thanks. I also really enjoyed tackling that audition.

name: 咲耶
text:
審査員の方々が楽しそうにしてくれてね
とても嬉しかったな
trans: The judges also seemed quite happy, right. That makes me really happy.

name: プロデューサー
text:
ああ。咲耶も楽しんでるってことが伝わってくる
いい笑顔だったぞ
trans: Yeah. You could tell that you were enjoying it. You had a good smile.

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ。人の笑顔を見ると、
私も自然と笑顔になってしまうんだ
trans: Hehe. When I see people's smiling faces, I naturally can't help but smile myself.

name: プロデューサー
text:
本番もその調子で、ファンに笑顔を届けよう
ファンも咲耶の笑顔で、もっと楽しくなれるはずだ！
trans: With that same style, let's bring a smile to the fans at your real performance. With the fans and Sakuya's smiles, we'll have even more fun!

name: 咲耶
text:
そうだね
本番も変わることなく、みんなを笑顔にできればいいな
trans: You're right. If nothing changes, I'll be able to make everyone smile at the real performance too.
